raw_text: COORAY – MONICA – (nee FERNANDO) – (Formerly of CEB). Wife of Ranjith Cooray,​ beloved mother of Sajith (Your Way Travels),​ mother-in-law of Avanthi,​ grandmother of Dulithi,​ Ranith and Ramith,​ sister of Marie Livera,​ Dulsy Nonis,​ Jesica Fernando,​ Manel Fernando and late Gamini Fernando,​ sister-in-law of late Nimal,​ Ashoka Cooray and Chandrani Gunawardana. Remains lie at Residence No. 468,​ Nawala Road,​ Rajagiriya. Cortege will leave residence at 3.00 p.m. on Sunday,​ 17th September 2023. Burial at General Cemetery,​ Borella (Anglican Section) at 4.30 p.m. No. 468,​ Nawala Road,​ Rajagiriya.059004

DE SILVA – DRUVI – Loving Thaththi of Malaika. Loved son of late Manik De Silva and of Naomi De Silva,​ brother of Kishan and brother-in-law of Sudeshika. Remains lie at God’s Little Acre,​ No. 83,​ Galpitahaboda Road,​ Kadalana,​ Moratuwa from 5.00 p.m. onwards on 15th September 2023. Service at 2 p.m. at Moratuwa and Cremation at 4 p.m. at General Cemetery Borella on 16th September 2023.058934

DE ZOYSA – Mrs RUPA RANJANI (nee De Silva). Wife of late Mr Mervin De Zoysa,​ loving mother of Roshan and Lasitha Gunaratne (Royal College),​ mother-in-law of Ruwani Gunaratne and Dr Neluka Weerasooriya (Da Vita UK),​ grandmother of Ramaaya,​ Liyaan,​ Lehaan,​ Kithmini and Anushka. Remains will lie at Jayaratne Funeral Parlour (Elvitigala Mawatha) from 15th September to 16th September. Cortege leaves Parlour at 4 p.m. Cremation at Borella Crematorium at 4.30 p.m.058972
